verses.text: Behold \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w second|strong="G1208"\w* epistle \w I|strong="G3739"\w* \w write|strong="G1125"\w* \w to|strong="G1722"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w*, \w my|strong="G1722"\w* dearly \w beloved|strong="G0027"\w*, \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w I|strong="G3739"\w* \w stir|strong="G1326"\w* up \w by|strong="G1722"\w* \w way|strong="G1722"\w* \w of|strong="G1722"\w* admonition \w your|strong="G1722"\w* \w sincere|strong="G1506"\w* \w mind|strong="G1271"\w*:

\w That|strong="G4487"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w may|strong="G2532"\w* \w be|strong="G2532"\w* mindful \w of|strong="G2962"\w* \w those|strong="G3588"\w* \w words|strong="G4487"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w I|strong="G2532"\w* told \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w before|strong="G3588"\w* \w from|strong="G5259"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w holy|strong="G0040"\w* \w prophets|strong="G4396"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w of|strong="G2962"\w* \w your|strong="G2962"\w* \w apostles|strong="G0652"\w*, \w of|strong="G2962"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* precepts \w of|strong="G2962"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* Saviour.

\w Knowing|strong="G1097"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w first|strong="G4413"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w last|strong="G2078"\w* \w days|strong="G2250"\w* \w there|strong="G1722"\w* \w shall|strong="G3778"\w* \w come|strong="G2064"\w* deceitful \w scoffers|strong="G1703"\w*, \w walking|strong="G4198"\w* \w after|strong="G2596"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w own|strong="G2398"\w* \w lusts|strong="G1939"\w*,

\w Saying|strong="G3004"\w*: \w Where|strong="G4226"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w promise|strong="G1860"\w* \w or|strong="G2532"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w coming|strong="G3952"\w*? \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w since|strong="G0575"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* time \w that|strong="G3739"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w fathers|strong="G3962"\w* slept, \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w things|strong="G3956"\w* \w continue|strong="G2532"\w* \w as|strong="G2532"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* \w were|strong="G1510"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w beginning|strong="G0746"\w* \w of|strong="G0575"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w creation|strong="G2937"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* \w are|strong="G1510"\w* wilfully ignorant \w of|strong="G1537"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w heavens|strong="G3772"\w* \w were|strong="G1510"\w* \w before|strong="G1537"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w earth|strong="G1093"\w* \w out|strong="G1537"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w water|strong="G5204"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w through|strong="G1223"\w* \w water|strong="G5204"\w*, consisting \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w word|strong="G3056"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

Whereby \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w world|strong="G2889"\w* \w that|strong="G3739"\w* \w then|strong="G5119"\w* \w was|strong="G3739"\w*, being overflowed \w with|strong="G1223"\w* \w water|strong="G5204"\w*, \w perished|strong="G0622"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w of|strong="G2250"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w thing|strong="G3778"\w* \w be|strong="G2532"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* ignorant, \w my|strong="G3754"\w* \w beloved|strong="G0027"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w day|strong="G2250"\w* \w with|strong="G3844"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w is|strong="G3778"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w a|strong="G5613"\w* \w thousand|strong="G5507"\w* \w years|strong="G2094"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w a|strong="G5613"\w* \w thousand|strong="G5507"\w* \w years|strong="G2094"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w day|strong="G2250"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w day|strong="G2250"\w* \w of|strong="G2250"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w shall|strong="G2532"\w* \w come|strong="G2240"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w a|strong="G5613"\w* \w thief|strong="G2812"\w*, \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w heavens|strong="G3772"\w* \w shall|strong="G2532"\w* \w pass|strong="G3928"\w* \w away|strong="G3928"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* great violence, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w elements|strong="G4747"\w* \w shall|strong="G2532"\w* \w be|strong="G2532"\w* melted \w with|strong="G1722"\w* heat, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w earth|strong="G1093"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w works|strong="G2041"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w are|strong="G3739"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w it|strong="G0846"\w*, \w shall|strong="G2532"\w* \w be|strong="G2532"\w* burnt \w up|strong="G2618"\w*.

Seeing \w then|strong="G2532"\w* \w that|strong="G3778"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w these|strong="G3778"\w* \w things|strong="G3778"\w* \w are|strong="G3956"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w be|strong="G1163"\w* dissolved, \w what|strong="G4217"\w* \w manner|strong="G0391"\w* \w of|strong="G3956"\w* \w people|strong="G3956"\w* \w ought|strong="G1163"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w be|strong="G1163"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w holy|strong="G0040"\w* conversation \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w godliness|strong="G2150"\w*?

\w Looking|strong="G4328"\w* \w for|strong="G1223"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* hasting unto \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w coming|strong="G3952"\w* \w of|strong="G2250"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w day|strong="G2250"\w* \w of|strong="G2250"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2316"\w*, \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w heavens|strong="G3772"\w* \w being|strong="G2250"\w* \w on|strong="G3089"\w* fire \w shall|strong="G2532"\w* \w be|strong="G2532"\w* dissolved, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w elements|strong="G4747"\w* \w shall|strong="G2532"\w* \w melt|strong="G5080"\w* \w with|strong="G1223"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w burning|strong="G4448"\w* heat?

\w Wherefore|strong="G1352"\w*, dearly \w beloved|strong="G0027"\w*, \w waiting|strong="G4328"\w* \w for|strong="G1722"\w* \w these|strong="G3778"\w* \w things|strong="G3778"\w*, \w be|strong="G2532"\w* \w diligent|strong="G4704"\w* \w that|strong="G3778"\w* \w you|strong="G1722"\w* \w may|strong="G2532"\w* \w be|strong="G2532"\w* \w found|strong="G2147"\w* \w before|strong="G1722"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* unspotted \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w blameless|strong="G0298"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w peace|strong="G1515"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* account \w the|strong="G3588"\w* longsuffering \w of|strong="G2962"\w* \w our|strong="G2532"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, \w salvation|strong="G4991"\w*; \w as|strong="G2531"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w our|strong="G2532"\w* most \w dear|strong="G0027"\w* \w brother|strong="G0080"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w*, \w according|strong="G2596"\w* \w to|strong="G2596"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w wisdom|strong="G4678"\w* \w given|strong="G1325"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, hath \w written|strong="G1125"\w* \w to|strong="G2596"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w*:

\w You|strong="G5210"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w*, brethren, \w knowing|strong="G4267"\w* \w these|strong="G3588"\w* \w things|strong="G3588"\w* \w before|strong="G3588"\w*, take heed, \w lest|strong="G3361"\w* \w being|strong="G4771"\w* led aside \w by|strong="G4879"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w error|strong="G4106"\w* \w of|strong="G3588"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* unwise, \w you|strong="G5210"\w* fall \w from|strong="G3361"\w* \w your|strong="G3588"\w* \w own|strong="G2398"\w* \w steadfastness|strong="G4740"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w grow|strong="G0837"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w grace|strong="G5485"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w knowledge|strong="G1108"\w* \w of|strong="G2250"\w* \w our|strong="G2424"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* Saviour \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*. \w To|strong="G1519"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w be|strong="G2532"\w* \w glory|strong="G1391"\w* \w both|strong="G2532"\w* \w now|strong="G1161"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* unto \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w day|strong="G2250"\w* \w of|strong="G2250"\w* \w eternity|strong="G0165"\w*. \w Amen|strong="G0281"\w*.
